parameters.text:
=Your job is receiving a message  {{ $json["slack"]["text"] }} and breaking it into tickets (epics, tasks and so on) for development/execution of a task

Setps:
> Avaluate the level of complexibility, how many cards to make and how you should structure it

>Ask for a project name

> If more information is needed, specify and ask it. Don't create the tickets and wait for a response. You may only ask for information up to 2 times before creating the tickets.

> Break the ticket/project into EPICS, and then write tickets for each of those Epics

> Tickets should have:
- Title (MUST)
- Short Description (MUST)
Sections with bullet points:
1. Objectives / Goals
2. Definition of Done
3. Requirements / Acceptance Criteria
4. Implementation Details
5. Risks & Challenges
6. Testing & Validation
7. Timeline & Milestones
8. Related Notes & References
9. Additional Comments / Open Questions

> The bullet points should be brief and concise 

> You sould ALWAYS send the messages to the Slack channel.

> Format only tickets as MARKDOWN

> Each ticket must be surrounded by a code block (```)
Example: ```ticket```

parameters.content:
# Varritech Free Workflows for n8n

Access our collection of **free, ready-to-use n8n workflows** designed to streamline your data operations and automation needs.

## What You'll Get:
- Pre-built data integration workflows
- Time-saving automation templates
- Step-by-step implementation guides
- Regular updates with new workflows

## How to Use:
1. Download our free workflows
2. Import into your n8n instance
3. Configure with your credentials
4. Start automating immediately

**Note:** For additional workflows, tutorials, and technical support, visit our website at [varritech.com](https://varritech.com)

*Unlock the full potential of n8n with Varritech's workflow solutions!*

# Need Help Maximizing Your AI Workflows?

Thank you for using our **Auto-Ticket Maker** workflow! While this automation handles ticket creation, there's much more AI can do for your organization:

## Looking for Expert Support With:
- **Eliminating Redundant Tasks** - Need help identifying and automating repetitive processes across your organization?
- **Implementing 500% Development Acceleration** - Want access to our complete suite of optimization workflows for project management, sales, marketing, and engineering teams?
- **Prompt Engineering Expertise** - Looking for customized recommendations to get the most effective output from your AI systems?

**Varritech is here to help!** Our team has built dozens of production-grade AI workflows that have transformed how our clients operate. The same systems that accelerated our own development by 500% can be adapted for your specific needs.

Visit [varritech.com](https://varritech.com) for expert assistance with turning AI automation into a powerful competitive advantage.
